long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that allows you to record a fast video using your camera and microphone, put some basic filters and download it, so you can use it later. You can use the extension to make amateur videos for the web or to store a memory. It is free to use, doesn't gather any of your data and is done, so you can easily shoot and apply effects without using complex software. Just hit record, apply some filters, play it to see the result and download it if you like it. During download video will play the result you are downloading - so wait until it finishes. Have fun!
